transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Nahi sir, mai isliye toh bata rahi hu inquiry ka ek alag se filter hota hai. Waha se aap saare direct messages dekh sakte ho. Sirf lead manager me saare aapko dhundne nahi padenge.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Ha sir, open kijiye us form ko, affidavit wale form ko.
Customer: Maine nikal liya aapne usme mere.
Customer: Print out nikal liya na?
Customer: Ha, theek hai. Aap sabse pehle dekhiye tyohar kya likha hai, affidavit on behalf of, waha pe likhiye Radha Krishna Overseas.
Customer: Ji aap dekhna waha pe Radha bhai Ranjit bhai hoga.
Customer: Ahmedabad se 6 November ko.
Customer: Radha Krishna Overseas.
Executive: Theek hai, uske niche dekhiye I, I ke bagal me likhiye aapka naam.
Customer: 6 November, theek hai, ha ji.
Executive: Aap likhiye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Likh diya.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha ji boliye na sir, hello.
Customer: Ha, ab uske niche dekhiye kya likhna hai, uske niche likhna hai director of Radha Krishna, fir uske niche company ka naam likhiye.
Customer: Nahi, isme I likh, I me Pravesh Kumar ho gaya uske baad uske just niche wali line me kya likhna hai?
Executive: Uske just niche line me Radha Krishna Overseas likhna hai. Aap usme wahi likh rahe hai ki kaha ke aap director hai, toh aapki company ka naam.
Executive: Fir uske niche likhna hai aapka address Firozabad jo bhi hai, jo aapke GST me address hai woh address waha mention kar dijiye.
Customer: Radha Krishna Overseas, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, GST me jo address hai waha ka?
Executive: Waha par aapke GST me jo address hai woh address mention kijiye.
Customer: Just niche wala.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Theek hai?
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Ab uske niche likhiye year, matlab ki kin saal aapka IndiaMART me onboard hua tha woh mai aapko bata deta hu. 21 ka hai shayad.
Executive: Ha nahi nahi mai bata deta hu, mai bata deta hu aapko.
Executive: Ek minute.
Executive: Sir waha pe likhiye 31 August 2021.
Customer: Ek minute. 31 August 2021.
Customer: 2021, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, ab sabse niche jaaiye waha par dekhiye aaya likha hoga deponent. Likha hua hai deponent?
Customer: Second page, second page pe hai na?
Executive: Ha ji.
Customer: Second page pe hai na?
Executive: Ha second page me ab usme kuch bhi nahi likhna.
Customer: Hmm, bataiye.
Executive: Ab uske niche deponent me waha pe apna sign kijiye aur company ka stamp lagaiye.
Customer: Pehle stamp uske baad sign mark, stamp lagaiye na zara. Stamp dena bhul gaya.
Customer: Hmm. Proprietor wali lagani hai ki gol wali hai jo lagao?
Executive: Matlab Radha Krishna Overseas ka lagayenge na sir.
Customer: Radha Krishna Overseas toh hai, ek toh round wali hai jo bill will me lagata hu, ek hoti hai proprietor ship. Proprietor.
Executive: Nahi jo aapka, ha nahi jo aapki company ke naam se circle wala hoga woh lagaiye sir.
Customer: Ha wahi hai circle wala, ha.
Customer: Ab sign kar deta hu isme ha.
Customer: Theek hai. Beech me karna hai na sign ko?
Customer: Ha ha, sign kijiye uske niche mohar maar dijiye.
Customer: Nahi maine toh sign mohar mari usme beech me bhi kar diye hai, alag se bhi kar du sign ke niche?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi koi dikkat nahi.
Customer: Theek hai. Ab verified ke niche likha hai verified at IndiaMART.
Customer: Ab mere ko isme ek cheez mujhe bataye pehle isme diya kya kya hai?
Executive: Isme dekhiye mai aapko batata hu, pehla mai aapko pura starting se batata hu, pehla point hai that my our company partnership firm or proper, koi bhi company hai partnership hai ya sole proprietorship hai, limited company hai. We always adopt honest trade practices, matlab ki sahi tarike se trade practice karenge and control the number of buyer complaint in my account listed. Matlab ki mai control karunga apne complaints ko.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Second point hai that I will shall not make fraudulent offer or attempt to make fraudulent offer or otherwise promote any illegal activity through my ever catalog. Matlab ki koi bhi mai aisa fraud wala kisi ko offer nahi karunga ya aise koi aisa kaam nahi karunga jiski wajah se illegal activity hamare catalog me ho.
Executive: Third point hai that I we shall not be part of any offer which is likely to device any user to do something which he may not otherwise do our part of any transaction, jaise ki maan lijiye ki koi galat transaction na kar raha ho, jaise ki unhone aapko paisa de diya product nahi diya ya kuch aisa paise se related kuch bhi illegal transaction nahi karna hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, chautha point hai ki that not be the part of report, matlab kisi bhi website se related kisi ke dusre company ka product apne company me product laga lena woh bhi ek tarike se hamara woh mana jata hai ki policy ke khilaf hai ki aap kisi dusre brand ka ya dusre matlab company ka photo apne company me nahi laga sakte.
Customer: Nahi, nahi agar usme uska branded jaise maan lijiye 300 ml bottle mai bhi sell kar raha hu, 300 Sahi wala bhi kar raha hai, 300 GM wale bhi kar rahe hai toh woh toh woh alag cheez hogi na? Uska khud ka trademark nahi hona chahiye.
Executive: Ha correct, wahi trademark ki baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Sir aap wahi cheez mai bol raha hu jaise ki aap Sahi Overseas wale ne apna naam likha, aapne Radha Krishna Overseas rakha hai. Toh yeh cheez nahi hoga ki aapne unka photo aapne me laga liya. Bottle toh same hai, mai bhi sam, mai samajh gaya lekin aapka brand, aapka trademark toh Radha Krishna Overseas aapne toh wahi lagaya na.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Usse related hai, theek hai, ab aate hai fifth point me, fifth point kya hai ki yeh dekhiye ab aata hai yeh logistic wala jo aapke sath hota hai sir. That we shall mention to the prospective buyer all the business terms and condition including but not limited to delivery terms logistic expenses damage after seeing services return refund installation and warranty guarantee policy on the invoice perform invoice or offer document. Dekhiye sir agar aapka koi aapka koi yeh concern hai ki aapka 7 din me product pahunchega, ek din me pahunchega toh woh cheez aap apne invoice me mention kijiye aur jab bhi aap buyer se deal karte hai aap apni condition ko unko bataiye, agar aapki policy nahi hai toh aap kuch ek proper tarike se invoice me policy generate karo sir. Jiske regarding delay hota hai ya kuch bhi damage jo jaise aapka ek maine policy dekha ki 2% ka damage hota hai toh aap usko recover nahi karte, aisa kuch hai na aapke invoice me maine dekha hai, mujhe Bablu ji ne bhi bataya tha. Theek hai, usi se aap yeh bhi policy laga sakte ho ki 7 din ke andar ya 10 din ke andar aapka samaan pahunchega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Samajh gaye, isse kya hota hai ki buyer bhi clear rahega ki ha yaar inka policy hai mai kyu hi kuch bolunga jab tak utna time nahi hoga tab tak mai wait karunga. Samajh gaye, toh yeh ek cheez aap apne invoice me change kar sakte ho apne buyer ko yeh cheez bata sakte hai aur koi itna jaldi bolta hai ki nahi mujhe kal tak chahiye, parso tak chahiye toh waha par sir aap unko samjhaiye. Samajh gaye na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur iske niche aur satwa point hamara hai ki kisi bhi matlab ki linkage nahi hona chahiye kisi bhi maan lijiye ki compensation against whatever IndiaMART including the subscription fees which has to pay to subscribe services linkage or non compliance. Matlab ki aapke catalog me kisi bhi tarike ka kisi bhi fraud se related ka linkage na ho sir. Theek hai? Yeh saare saat point hai sir. Isme se jo aapke liye main point hai woh hai panchwa point ki hamara logistic wala policy aap thoda sa apne invoice me daliye aur dusra ki hame complaint ko control karna hai second point me. Theek hai? Ab iske niche sir last me dekhiye verified at IndiaMART likh dijiye on this day aaj ka date day likhiye.
Customer: Verified at IndiaMART.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Theek hai, uske niche aaj ka.
Executive: Likh dijiye 10.
Customer: Nahi uske baad on this diya on this me kya hai?
Executive: On this day me likhiye aaj ka date.
Customer: Aaj toh hai.
Executive: On this ke bagal me likhiyega Monday, Monday ke bagal me aaj ka date likhiyega.
Customer: Nahi on this ke baad Monday likhna hai na?
Executive: Ha waha Monday likhiye uske bagal me 10 11 10 2025.
Customer: Day of ke baad likhna hai 10.
Executive: 11 10 11 October. Aaj 11 tarikh hai aur.
Customer: 11 10 2025. Ha. Nahi 11 kaha 10 hi toh hai aaj.
Executive: Ha sorry aaj 10 tarikh hai. 11 11 mahina hai. Ha mahina hai ha.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, uske niche bhi aap sign kijiye aur waha bhi ek mohar maar dijiye. Deponent, deponent me na?
Executive: Ha deponent ke niche correct.
Executive: Aur jo maine aapko document ka diya tha ID proof, theek hai, electricity bill aur rent agreement, ek cancel check, ek GST certificate jo aapke paas ho gayi aur apne office ka. Rent agreement pura purana hoga abhi ka nahi hoga.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi sir, rent agreement aapka proper tarike se hai na address ke sath?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ha aap mujhe de dijiye koi dikkat nahi hai, theek hai aur Aadhar PAN toh hoga phone me hi, cancel check ek photo bana ke de dijiye, GST certificate aur apne office ka yeh abhi turant photo click karke aur kaha jaha par aapke Radha Krishna Overseas ka naam likha hoga uska photo aap mujhe WhatsApp kar dijiye sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance filling affidavit form.

- Needs clarification on document requirements.



Resolution:

- Executive guided customer through affidavit form.

- Explained key points of IndiaMART policies.

- Clarified document requirements for verification.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to send required documents via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- affidavit, documentation, policies, gst
